publicAccess.label: Public access?
publicAccess.description: If the public access is true (default) then the file will be stored in a public filesystem. If not, then it will be stored in a private (non-web-accessible) filesystem.

uploadPath.label: Upload path
uploadPath.description: The default upload path, relative to `base_url`, where the uploaded files will be stored.

overwrite.label: Overwrite on save / update?
overwrite.description: If true, when a target file already exists on the filesystem it will be overwritten. If false, a new unique name will be generated (with a suffix).

acceptedMimetypes.label: Accepted mime types
acceptedMimetypes.description: List of accepted mimetypes. Leave empty to accept all types (no mimetype constraint).

maxFilesize.label: Maximum file size
maxFilesize.description: Maximum allowed file size, in bytes. If 0, null or empty, then there are no size constraint.
